Nouadhibou.title: Nouadhibou
Nouadhibou.byline: Nouadhibou is the second largest city in Mauritania.

Nouakchott.title: Nouakchott
Nouakchott.byline: Nouakchott is the capital of Mauritania and its largest city, with almost 1.2 million residents in 2019.

Nouméa.title: Nouméa
Nouméa.byline: Nouméa is the largest city in and capital of New Caledonia, lying on the main island of Grande Terre.

Nouvelle-Aquitaine.title: Nouvelle-Aquitaine
Nouvelle-Aquitaine.byline: Nouvelle-Aquitaine (Occitan: Nòva Aquitania, Basque: Akitania Berria, Poitevin-Saintongeais: Novéle-Aguiéne; all mean New Aquitaine in English) is the largest region of France.
